lines.text:
[about the policeman]
Come on! Get this guy out of my neck.
Get him off yourself, you speak Spanish.

[in Spanish]
Miss, do you know this man?

[in Spanish]
I've never seen him before.
What did you say to him?
I've told him that we're complete strangers.

[in Spanish to the police officer]
No, no. This is my woman... my wife.
Wait a minute!

[in Spanish]
Then both of you come to the Inspector General office.

[talking to Lt. Ruiz]
Once upon a time there was a little cat who had a little mouse right in his paws but he let the little mouse go that later he could follow that little mouse into a group of little "mouses"
[correcting]
mice!

[to Joan]
I'm the kind of guy who doesn't like to turn around, Chiquita. Besides, that there's a guy behind me with a gun. Remember?
Where's Fiske?
Taking the parrot for a walk.
You wouldn't be his wife, would you?
No, I wouldn't!
Mmm-hmm!

[taking offense]
I don't like the 'Mmm-hmm.' I'm not his wife!
If you were, I wouldn't be saying 'Mmm-hmm!'

[running out of bullets]
It'll be getting dark soon. I hate the thought of spending the night with an empty revolver.
There's always me.
Tonight you gotta pick?
...I gave Jin $2000. I thought it was a fortune.
Don't tell me he clipped you?
He called it 'borrowing.'
No security?
Unless you call a nice smile security.
That's all you got for your money?
Certainly was.

[sarcastically]
I'll tell you what, Chiquita, you believe me, and I'll believe you.
